definition: to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)
Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
bright/opposite: dark 暗[an4]/(of meaning) clear/to understand/next/public or open/wise/generic term for a sacrifice to the gods
as rivers Jing and Wei separate clearly (idiom)/to be entirely different
to make a clear difference between what one likes and what one hates/to have well-defined likes and dislikes

sentences.english: It was a haunting vision, the past compellingly present.
sentences.chinese: 这是一幅令人难以忘怀的景象，过去分明就在眼前。

sentences.english: The definition of the pre-R0 separation axiom was introduced.
sentences.chinese: 定义了不分明拓扑空间的拟R0分离公理。

sentences.english: The main sound box uses the edges and corners distinct rectangle design, the line succinct sprightly .
sentences.chinese: 主音箱采用棱角分明的长方形设计，线条简洁明快。

sentences.english: Gradually, the sky lit up, sea, and days have become clear when.
sentences.chinese: 渐渐地，天空亮了起来，海和天也变得分明了。

sentences.english: Our creed has always been that business is business.
sentences.chinese: 我们的信条一直是公私分明。

sentences.english: Are the left and right so religiously cleaved ?
sentences.chinese: 至于左派与右派，在宗教信仰上是否也壁垒分明？

sentences.english: It is clearly water overflowing rain, the joy and fresh.
sentences.chinese: 那分明是流水满溢，雨后初晴的欣喜和清新。

sentences.english: It looks exactly like the spinning astrolabe from the opening credits.
sentences.chinese: 这看起来分明就像片头里旋转的星盘。

sentences.english: We live in a world of black and white morality: this is something we all know.
sentences.chinese: 众所周知，我们生活在一个是非善恶黑白分明的世界。

sentences.english: There is a great divide between liberals and conservatives in the government.
sentences.chinese: 政府泾渭分明地分为了自由党和保守党两个党派。

sentences.english: Izumi and I had a strictly compartmentalised yet totally intimate relationship.
sentences.chinese: 泉和我保持着一种泾渭分明却又亲密无间的关系。

sentences.english: It’s jet black, all sharp angles and industrial-looking edges.
sentences.chinese: 它全身墨黑，棱角分明，带浓浓的工业气息。

sentences.english: The working environment should be of a structured nature.
sentences.chinese: 工作的环境应该像条理分明的生物界。

sentences.english: The practical result was to harden the battle lines.
sentences.chinese: 实际的结果就是双方壁垒更加分明。

sentences.english: There have been indubitable signs already.
sentences.chinese: 已有十分明确无疑的迹象。

sentences.english: How does it know one from another?
sentences.chinese: 可不知它是如何做到良莠分明的。

definition: variant of 彷彿|仿佛[fang3 fu2]
